inclusion.criterion: Lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS) felt to be secondary to bladder outlet obstruction from benign prostatic hyperplasia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Maximum urinary flow rate < 15 ml/sec, voided volume ≥ 125 cc
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Transrectal ultrasound determined prostate volume ≤ 60 cc
inclusion.label: met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. Currently has severe bulbar urethral stricture.
